name: Antechamber
longDesc: A chamber of finely carved stone once designed to impress visitors now holds a distinctly ominous air. Rows of statues seem to stand guard over this long-forgotten place make it hard to shake the feeling of being watched, and send a clear message: you are not welcome here.
shortDesc: A hall of ominous statues guarding the way into this forgotten ruin

shelves.name: Torch Mount
shelves.desc: A metal torch mount hanging along one of the walls by the entrance to the room

doors.name: Opened Stone Gate
doors.desc: The large stone gate that opened the gateway to this hidden castle
doors.unlock_desc: The gate has already been opened.

doors.name: Stone Archway
doors.desc: Leading to the Nexus is a large, stone archway.  Enscribed in the stones are words that don't appear to be from any language you know.
